Others: The Baltimore Orioles were eliminated from the American League playoffs on Wednesday after being swept by the Kansas City Royals.
It's the second consecutive year that Baltimore has been beaten in their first playoff series.
The Orioles offense failed to show up in this series, being beaten 1-0 and 2-1 in the two games.
Baltimore has now dropped 10 consecutive playoff games, which moves them up an unfortunate group in baseball history.
Only the 2004-2020 Minnesota Twins (18), the 1986-1995 Orioles (13), the 1915-1976 Phillies (11), the 1958-1991 (10) Braves and 1980-1985 Royals (10) have lost 10 consecutive playoff games or more.
